author: crossley
msg: Move the cocoon-docs sources to the "test-sources" directory.
There is no need to do 'svn checkout' on the server.
Forrestbot obtains these sources via SVN.

author: rich
msg: A user (Pete Hale) noticed that we're still packaging commons-collections.jar, which was part of the Struts 1.2.4 distribution but was removed for 1.2.7.  This removes it for NetUI.

author: crossley
msg: Move the forrestbot config file to here.
This location enables it to be automatically configured.
Rename it to "cocoon-docs" as there is already a "cocoon-site"

author: rich
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-976 : button tag forwards to base class actions even when inheritLocalPaths=true

author: jvanzyl
msg: o can't have enough references to the documentation
o add a guide for using ant tasks within the POM
